chart.name: Heap Usage

publishLabelOptions.displayName: total heap size used by db
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.extra_info.heap_usage_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Queries/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.opcounters.query', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top Hosts by Non Mapped Memory (bytes)
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.mem.virtual', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.mem.mapped', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A - B).top(count=5).mean(by=['host']).scale(1024).scale(1024).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Total Global Lock Active Operations
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.globalLock.activeClients.readers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.globalLock.activeClients.writers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Deletes/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.opcounters.delete', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=95).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Top Hosts by Distinct Requests/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.network.numRequests', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).top(count=5).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Non Mapped Memory
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.mem.virtual', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0'), extrapolation='last_value').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.mem.mapped', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).scale(1024).scale(1024).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Hosts
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.uptime', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).mean(by=['host']).count().publish(label='A')

chart.name: DBs with Lagest Storage, Index, Data Size
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.storageSize', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0'), maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).sum(by=['db', 'host']).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.indexSize', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0'), maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).sum(by=['db', 'host']).publish(label='B')
C = data('gauge.dataSize', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0'), maxExtrapolations=2).top(count=1).sum(by=['db', 'host']).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Total Global Lock Active Operations
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.globalLock.activeClients.readers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.globalLock.activeClients.writers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Total Network I/O bytes/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.network.bytesIn', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).sum().publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.network.bytesOut', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).sum().publish(label='B')

chart.name: Page Faults/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.extra_info.page_faults', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Global Lock  Queued Operations
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.globalLock.currentQueue.readers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0')).publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.globalLock.currentQueue.writers', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0')).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Top Hosts by Non Mapped Memory (bytes)
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.mem.virtual', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.mem.mapped', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A - B).top(count=5).mean(by=['host']).scale(1024).scale(1024).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Page Faults/Sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.extra_info.page_faults', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: # Connections
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.connections.current', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('host', 'integration-test-mongodb-2.6-0'), maxExtrapolations=2).mean().publish(label='A')

chart.name: Total Background Flushes/sec
chart.programText: A = data('counter.backgroundFlushing.flushes', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).sum().publish(label='A')

chart.name: Top DBs by Document Count
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.objects', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*')), maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=['db']).top(count=100).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Master Node
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.repl.is_primary_node', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).top(count=1).sum(by=['host']).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Queries/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.opcounters.query', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', '*'))).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')

chart.name: # Hosts
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.repl.active_nodes', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0'), extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=['host']).count().publish(label='A')

chart.name: Heap Usage

publishLabelOptions.displayName: total heap size used by db
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.extra_info.heap_usage_bytes', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Top DBs by Document Count
chart.programText: A = data('gauge.objects', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0'), maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=['db']).top(count=100).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Mutations/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.opcounters.insert', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.opcounters.update', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and filter('cluster', 'rs0')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A+B).min().publish(label='C')
D = (A+B).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='D')
E = (A+B).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='E')
F = (A+B).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='F')
G = (A+B).max().publish(label='G')

chart.name: Top Hosts by Requests/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.network.numRequests', filter=filter('plugin', 'mongo') and (not filter('cluster', 'rs0'))).mean(by=['host']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).top(count=5).publish(label='B')
